items.title: Crystal Palace is slachtoffer van waanzinnige FA Cup-stunt
items.summary: Macclesfield FC heeft voor een geweldige stunt gezorgd door Crystal Palace uit te schakelen in het FA Cup-toernooi. De club van het zesde niveau was de winnaar van de vorige editie van het Engelse bekertoernooi zaterdagmiddag in eigen huis de baas.

items.title: Everton and Sunderland goes to extra time, Wolves 6-1 Shrewsbury, and more: FA Cup third round ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from Saturday‚Äôs afternoon kick-offs ‚öΩ Live scores | Read Football Daily | Mail Tom Arokodare added another in added-time, apologies I missed that in thee excitement at Macclesfield and Everton. Yeremy Pino makes the six minutes of injury time interesting with a decent free-kick that gets up and over the wall. Can Macclesfield hang on? Continue reading...

The defender signed for the Gunners in the summer but has struggled to break into the first team. Arsenal announced huge news in this transfer window earlier this week but it did not concern a player. The manager Ren√©e Slegers signed a new deal which runs until 2029, a massively important bit of business for the Gunners to do: Continue reading...

Peep! After a brief delay to tidy up a cone left behind from the warm-up (!), Macclesfield get the game under way on the 4G surface. Continue reading...

items.title: Macclesfield make it two against reigning champions
items.summary: Isaac Buckley-Ricketts sends Macclesfield 2-0 up against reigning FA Cup champions Crystal Palace.

items.title: VI Live: Brobbey en Roefs maken zich op voor verlenging in FA Cup
items.summary: Zaterdag wordt de Eredivisie weer hervat. Er staan vier wedstrijden op het programma. Daarnaast is er volop voetbal in het buitenland. In deze VI Live blijf je op de hoogte van de belangrijkste verrichtingen in binnen- en buitenland.

items.title: Sources: Man United aim for boss clarity next week
items.summary: Manchester United are hoping to have clarity on who will lead the team for the rest of the season early next week, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Alonso to 'assess the risk' on Mbappe fitness
items.summary: Xabi Alonso said Real Madrid will "assess the risk" of playing Kylian Mbapp√© in Sunday's Supercopa final with Barcelona, with the star forward racing to recover from a knee sprain.

items.title: Parkinson revels as Wrexham pass 'next stage'
items.summary: Phil Parkinson believes knocking Nottingham Forest out of the FA Cup will help Wrexham's push to play Premier League teams on an equal footing.

items.title: Rosenior: Chelsea can equal Man Utd 'class of 92'
items.summary: Liam Rosenior believes Chelsea can emulate Manchester United's fabled 'Class of '92' as they pursue a policy of targeting silverware with young players.

items.title: Arsenal 'chasing' trophies, 'the purpose' - Arteta
items.summary: Mikel Arteta said the "purpose" of Arsenal was to win silverware -- and admitted his season would be judged by how many trophies the north London club could win.

items.title: Gauff extends winning streak versus Swiatek - but USA out of United Cup
items.summary: Coco Gauff beat Iga Swiatek for the fourth match in a row to lay down a marker ahead of the Australian Open - but then lost in the mixed doubles as defending United Cup champions USA were dumped out by Poland at the semi-final stage in Sydney.

items.title: Bandaged Dawson puts Macclesfield ahead against Palace
items.summary: Shortly after adjusting the bandages on his head after picking up an injury early in the match, Paul Dawson nods home Macclesfield's opener to put them ahead against Crystal Palace.

items.title: O'Neil makes four Celtic changes vs Dundee Utd LIVE!
Cardiff say transfer embargo will be 'removed'
items.summary: Cardiff City are under a transfer embargo for "non-submission of annual accounts", but say the situation will be resolved in the coming days.

items.title: Altena koos bewust voor alternatieve route: 'Dan maar even niet het mannetje'
items.summary: Jordi Altena bewandelt een alternatief carri√®repad. De verdediger werd opgeleid bij Vitesse, zette een stap terug naar de amateurs en maakte via RKC Waalwijk een fraaie transfer naar de koploper van Schotland (Heart of Midlothian). Altena herkende het moment dat hij nederig moest zijn.

items.title: Wintertransfers Eredivisie seizoen 2025/26: alle clubs op een rij
items.summary: De transferperiode is weer losgebarsten. In dit overzicht van VI vind je alle afgeronde, door clubs bevestigde, wintertransfers van de achttien Eredivisie-clubs. Clubs in Nederland kunnen tot en met 3 februari spelers aantrekken.

items.title: 'Barcelona gaat Rashford definitief vastleggen'
items.summary: Barcelona is voornemens om Marcus Rashford te kopen van Manchester United. Dat hebben bronnen bevestigd tegenover onder meer The Athletic en Mundo Deportivo . In het huurcontract van de aanvaller is een koopclausule opgenomen.

items.title: WSL: Arsenal pressing for winner against 10-player Man Utd LIVE!
Biggest FA Cup shock ever?! Sixth-tier Macclesfield dump out holders Palace LIVE!
